title: The Best Cheese And Potato Pie
directions: Peel and finely chop potatoes.Boil for 8-10mins and leave to cool.
grate cheese,and add to potato,with the s&p.Mash slightly with a fork.
spoon filling onto half,and fold spare half over sealing edges with butter,
place on greased baking tray,and brush melted butter on top of pie.
bake in oven for 25mins or until golden.
ingredients: around 500g potatoes(depending on how much cheese you're using)can also use mash.
i also like to add cream cheese for creaminess.
